messages.message: Hi team, feedback from customer Kering: as they will manage many workspaces, they would like to see a Search Bar in the UI, as well as a folder or hierarchy system to organise them. Curious to hear product view on that and if any other customer(s) asked for this before.

I understand the need for having a search bar to help users find the workspace they need.

This is my first time hearing the need for organizing/managing workspaces. @Lucile why does Kering need a folder/hierarchy mechanism? are workspaces related?

cc @Josh Rad @jack.robbins

I'm guessing these asks are both due to the expected high # of workspaces? Search seems like a much more management _near_-term enhancement vs. hierarchy, more thought would need to go into hierarchy & if it truly makes sense in AI Hub broadly.
